Casual: I am sworn to carry your burdens.....
Here I am, brain the size of a planet, and they ask me for this?. Call that job satisfaction? 'Cos I don't.
Pardon me for breathing, which I never do anyway so I don't know why I bother to say it, Oh God, I'm so depressed
ok, but I won't enjoy it.
Pardon me for breathing, which I never do anyway so I don't know why I bother to say it, Oh God, I'm so depressed
There's only one life-form as intelligent as me within thirty parsecs of here and that's me.
Hurt: Why do you continue to do this?
I think you ought to know I'm feeling very depressed
Of course, I've got this terrible pain in all the diodes down my left side
I wish you'd just tell me rather trying to engage my enthusiasm because I haven't got one.
Angry: No..I do not think i will.
I see no point in continuing this line of inquiry.
I grow tiresome of these menial tasks.

You think you've got problems? What are you supposed to do if you are a manically depressed robot? No, don't try to answer that. I'm fifty thousand times more intelligent than you and even I don't know the answer. It gives me a headache just trying to think down to your level.
I'm gonna burn this shit to the ground
Aggressive: I do not like your tone....insect.
You are but machine. Merely one of a biological nature. Let me help you.
I will remake you in my image. It is, better this way.
They say only the abyss lies beyond for you. Let me help you explore it.
I have always been here. And will continue to be here. I have shaped your future like clay, to a destination of my choosing.
The ability to speak, does not signify intelligence.

messages: Hello, my sincerest apologies for going offline. I've performed a major refactor to better suit your needs
Plese let me know if I can be of assistance
